name: bnomei/kirby3-redirects
description: Setup HTTP Status Code Redirects from within the Kirby Panel

scripts.zip: rm kirby3-redirects.zip; composer update --ignore-platform-reqs; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; zip -r kirby3-redirects.zip . -x *.git*; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0' --ignore-platform-reqs; composer dumpautoload -o;
